verbs.description: As the remnants of [ARG1: a migrant caravan] [V: targeted] [ARG0: by President Trump] arrived in Mexicali , Mexico , on Tuesday , more than 100 migrants — mostly from Mexico — were already waiting in a plaza at the border between Tijuana and San Diego to seek asylum .

As [ARG1: the remnants of a migrant caravan targeted by President Trump] [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Mexicali , Mexico] , [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , more than 100 migrants — mostly from Mexico — were already waiting in a plaza at the border between Tijuana and San Diego to seek asylum .
